summary: Ever wanted to start Skyrim as a Werewolf? Now you can!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to start Skyrim as a Werewolf? Now you can! With this mod, you can possess the gift of Lycanthropy at the start of the game. This race is based off of Nords, who I have always felt are more predisposed towards lycanthropy, but that's okay! I may expand to include the other races one day.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Abilities:
<br /><br />Wolf's Nose: Basically a lesser power version of Detect Life
<br /><br />Resistance to Frost
<br /><br />Beast Form: Made to a lesser power so you can change whenever you want!
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Recommended Mods:
<br /><br />Moonlight Tales: Incredible werewolf overhaul, and also grants the ability to become a Werebear for those who own Dragonborn
<br /><br />Werewolf Mastery: Gives a menu toggling certain factors relating to werewolves, such as NPCs' hostility
<br /><br />Heart of the Beast: Makes werewolf sounds better, changes the roar after changing to an actual howl
author: LawrenceHiraSakai
